page.title: 08HOME LIFE IN THORNTON
page.content: AT 8 O'CLOCK IN THE MORNING MY MUM WAKES ME UP.I GET OUT OF BED THEN I PUT ON MY DRESSING GOWN AND SLIPPERS AND GO DOWNSTAIRS.MY MUM MAKES ME RICE CRISPIES MILK AND SUGAR.THEN PUT MY CLOTHES ON.I HAVE A DRINK AND LATER GO UPSTAIRS TO CLEAN MY TEETH.I CALL FOR MY FRIEND SARAH. WE WALK TO SCHOOL AND WAIT FOR THE WHISTLE.WE GO INSIDE AND HAVE ASSEMBLY THEN DO WORK.AT PLAYTIME WE PLAY CHASE.THEN WE GO SWIMMING.WE COME BACK FOR DINNER THEN WE HAVE CHANGE OVER.WE HAVE PLAYTIME THEN A STORY.AFTER THAT WE PUT OUR CHAIR UP AND SAY PRAYERS.WE WALK HOME PUT OUR BAGS DOWN AND GO OUT TO PLAY.I GO FOR MY PIANO LESSONS.I GO HOME HAVE TEA AND PLAY OUT.WHEN IT IS TIME TO GO IN I GO ON THE COMPUTER.THEN I HAVE MY SUPPER COFFEE AND TOAST THEN GO TO BED. BY {CLAIRE WARBURTON.}
